definition: and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
thick and thin/coarse and fine/thickness (caliber)/coarseness/quality of work

sentences.english: Rootstock a deep taproot to 10 mm thick.
sentences.chinese: 根莖爲深的直根，粗的10毫米。

sentences.english: For coarser counts, try with a doubling of six.
sentences.chinese: 對粗支紗，請試着使用六根併合。

sentences.english: A light-colored tuff used in hydraulic cement.
sentences.chinese: 粗麪凝灰岩一種用來生產硬。

sentences.english: Did not have painful apprehension, thick nature is meddlesome .
sentences.chinese: 沒有了痛的顧慮，粗自然是好事了。

sentences.english: Commercial scale test of selective precipitation method for Mo removal from tungstate solution;
sentences.chinese: 研究了用硫酸銅沉澱法除去粗鎢酸鈉溶液中鉬的方法。

sentences.english: When measuring the lower torque, replace to with a liny spring.
sentences.chinese: 當測量小扭力時，用細彈簧替換粗彈簧。

sentences.english: Switch to whole-wheat couscous and pasta
sentences.chinese: 轉變去食用全麥製作的粗麥粉和通心粉。

sentences.english: Sweet and Sour Pork with Steamed Rice and Asian Vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 青菜炒粗麪配蒸豬肉餃。

sentences.english: In chapter three the author refer how to design the activity of Web-Based Cooperative Learning.
sentences.chinese: 第三章閉於網絡合做教習活動做了略粗描述。

sentences.english: The target is seven-tenths of 1% of gross national income.
sentences.chinese: 這項標準是援助達到國家粗收入的千分之七。

sentences.english: Gross crystalline imperfections like twinning are apparent to the unaided eye .
sentences.chinese: 粗的晶體不完整性，如孿生體可用肉眼看出。

sentences.english: Woolly and coarse, opossum is often used for liners and men's coats.
sentences.chinese: 羊毛和粗，負鼠通常用於輪船和男子的大衣。

sentences.english: The padding is firm but ruder , green glazed with white.
sentences.chinese: 胎體堅質但較粗，釉色白中微閃青。

sentences.english: Ion sources are generally employed in two distinct modes.
sentences.chinese: 離子源粗分爲兩種不同的模式。

sentences.english: The rough extract of Pinggu mushroom PPO was obtained by ammonium sulfate precipitation method.
sentences.chinese: 採用硫酸銨沉澱法得到平菇多酚氧化酶粗提液。

sentences.english: His girth is much ampler than mine.
sentences.chinese: 他的腰身比我的粗多了。
